bard.bard_rare:
`{0} kneels.`
`Maia places a lute upon {1} shoulder.`
Sois bard, au nom de Dieu.
`Maia strikes a G7(♭9♯11) chord with the lute.`
Avancez, bard.

calc.desc:
Powered by python's math package. Also contains custom Imperial ↔ Metric conversions: °F↔°C, in↔cm, mi↔km.
'You see I use both the F and the C row orders.'
calc.help:
Calculates stuff. Specify an expression.
Example:
!calculate 1+3
Maia, evaluate mi_km(sin(pi/6))

mute.desc: Proceed to spend an eternity beating your Past.
mute.help:
Cast a vile soul into the Gungeon. Specify a mention then the amount of hours.
Can be followed by a reason.
Example:
!gungeon @Paradox#6969 888
!gungeon @Convict#5555 12 BEING A FOOL
mute.brief: Cast a vile soul into the Gungeon
mute.negative_duration: You cannot Gungeon someone in the Past, fool!
mute.mute: I hereby cast {0} into the Gungeon for {1} hours for {2}!
mute.unmute: I hereby retrieve {0} from the Gungeon after {1} hours for not {2}!

roll.help:
Rolls dice. Specify a die in the format of xdy+m.
Can be followed by a reason, or the number of repeats, or both (number of repeats goes first).
Examples:
!roll 3d6
!roll 3d6 fireball
!roll 3d6 2
!roll 3d6 2 two fireballs
roll.brief: Rolls dice in the format of xdy+m
roll.randorg_juice: Random.org out of juice! Using pseudo RNG.

wiki.desc: Search the Library of Maia to learn about various topics.
wiki.help:
Helps you with lore. Specify an entry.
Can redirect entries.
Example:
!wiki tome
